item.title: Book List of 2022 - A recap of the books read
item.description: Alas I’ll admit that I probably get through approximately 1 or 2 books a month and honestly this year we had our second kid so it seems I didn’t even make it that far! So with work-life (children, exercise, children again) balance I try to make sure my time reading really counts. Which I’ve learned it really hard to do, child no. 1 is usually trying to fight me for the reading spot, and baby no.
